summary: **Gladiator II** is a new action movie by director Ridley Scott. It's a follow-up to the 2000 film "Gladiator." The story is about Lucius, who was once in line to rule the Roman Empire. After his home is attacked, he becomes a gladiator. The movie stars Paul Mescal and Denzel Washington. It was a long time in the making, with talks starting in 2001. Filming happened between 2023 and 2024. The film will come out in many countries in November 2024 and later in the U.S. and Canada. There's also talk of another sequel, "Gladiator III."
title: Gladiator II
